cd package1
gunk generate .
cd ..
cd package2
gunk generate .

grep 'SomeField package1.MyType' all.pb.go

-- go.mod --
module testdata.tld/util

-- package1/types.gunk --
package package1

type MyType int

const (
  FIRST MyType = 0
  SECOND MyType = 1
)

-- package2/struct.gunk --
package package2

import "testdata.tld/util/package1"

type MyStruct struct {
  SomeField package1.MyType `pb:"1" json:"number`
}

-- package2/struct2.gunk --
package package2

import "testdata.tld/util/package1"

type MyStructTwo struct {
  SomeField package1.MyType `pb:"1" json:"number`
}

-- package2/all.pb.go.golden --
nope

-- .gunkconfig --
[generate go]
plugins=grpc
plugin_version=v1.4.3
